T02bsu013_u:3: saṃskṛte punaruddhāritam bhāratīyabhāṣāyām - āryacaturdharmanirdeśaṃ nāma mahāyānasutram
T02bsu013_u:4: namaḥ sarvabuddhabodhisattvebhyaḥ evaṃ mayā śrutam - ekasmin samaye bhagavān buddhaḥ trāyastriṃśadeveṣu sudharmādevasabhāyāṃ sārddhaṃ pañcānāṃ
T02bsu013_u:6: tasmin samaye bhagavān buddhaḥ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ maitreyamuddiśyopadiṣṭavān -
T02bsu013_u:7: caturbhirmaitreya! dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṛtopacitaṃ pāpamabhibhavati
T02bsu013_u:13: tatra pratipakṣasamudācāraḥ kṛtvā 'pyakuśalaṃ karma kuśale karmaṇyatyarthābhiyogaṃ gataḥ
T02bsu013_u:23: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena maitreyeṇa taiśca bhikṣubhiḥ bodhisattvaiḥ śatakratvādidevaputraiḥ sarvasampannaparimaṇḍalena ca āptamanasā bhagavataḥ pravacanamabhinanditam /
T02bsu013_u:25: bhāratīyopādhyāyasurendrabodhinā mahālocāvā - vandejñānasenena cānūditaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ ca /
